Translations.Text: My utvoryly vas tomu shcho tovaryshi (dlya odyn odnym)
utvorenyy My sleeping takym chynom vy mozhete vidpochyty
My pobuduvaly nad vamy sim vsesvitu
My posylayemo vnyz z khmar llyucha voda
Shchob vyrobyty z tse zerna ta zavody
denʹ rih duyetʹsya, ta vy vkhodyte do natovpu
hory budutʹ usuvatysya, tak, yakby vony buly mirage
Dlya porushnykiv; tse bude yikh abode
Vony zalyshayutʹsya u tse duzhe davno
Vony nikoly ne kushtuyutʹ u tse coolness, ne napiy
Vony nikoly ochikuvani ne buty vlashtovani pidzvitnyy
Zaznayutʹ naslidkiv; my tilʹky zbilʹshymo vash retribution
Vony nikoly ne pochuyutʹ u tse budʹ-yake bez·hluzdya abo brekhnya
vynahoroda z vashoho Lorda; velykodushna vynahoroda
Lord neba ta zemli, ta vse mizh nymy. Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy. Niyakyy kozhnyy ne mozhe skasuvaty Yoho rishennya
denʹ prybude koly Dukh ta anhely lyshatʹsya v syli u ryadi. Nikhto ne budutʹ rozmovlyaty krim tsykh dozvolenoho naybilʹshym Dobrozychlyvyy, ta vony vymovlyatʹ tilʹky shcho virno
Takyy yavlyaye soboyu nemynuchyy denʹ. Whoever wills dozvolyayutʹ yomu berutʹ prytulok u yoho Lordi
My dostatno poperedyly vas pro nemynuchyy retribution. Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ koly kozhnyy vyvchytʹ yaki yoho ruky poslaly vpered, ta disbeliever skazhe, "O, ya bazhayu ya pyl
Ta tsey khto gently berutʹ (dushi viruyuchiv) joyfully
Yak tse vidbulosya pislya my povernulysya u hnyli kistky
Yoho Lord zaklykav yoho u svyashchennyy valley Tuwaa
Rozpovidayutʹ yomu, "Chy ne mohly b vy ne polipshytysya
Dozvolyayete meni keruyete vamy do vashoho Lorda, shcho vy mozhete povernutysya shanoblyvi
Vin todi pokazav yomu velyke chudo
Vin skazav, "ya ye vash Lord; naybilʹsh vysokyy
Otzhe, BOH zdiysnyv yoho do retribution u U maybutnʹomu, tak zhe, yak i u pershomu zhytti
vy bilʹshe tyazhki stvoryuyete nizh nebesa? Vin skonstruyuvav tse
Vin pidnyav yoho masy, ta perfected tse
Vin zrobyv yoho nich temnu, ta brightened yoho morn
Z tse, Vin vyrobyv yoho vlasnu vodu ta pasovyshche
Vse tse zabezpechyty pidtrymku zhyttya dlya vas ta vashykh tvaryn
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ koly lyudsʹkyy z·hadaye vse vin
Yak dlya khto reverenced velychnistʹ yoho Lorda, ta nakazanoho samoho z sinful lusts
Vony prosyatʹ vas pro Hodynu, ta koly yomu budete maty mistse
Tse - ne vy (Muhammad) khto destined oholosyty yoho chas
Vasha misiya musytʹ poperedyty tsi khto ochikuyutʹ tse
denʹ vony bachatʹ tse, vony budutʹ vidchuvaty tak, yakby vony vytrymaly odyn vechir abo polovyna denʹ
Yak vy znayete? Vin mozhe ochystyty sebe
Abo vin mozhe vzyaty uvahu, ta mozhe maty vyhodu z povidomlennya
Nezvazhayuchy na te, shcho vy ne mohly harantuvaty yoho ryatuvannya
Prykroshchi do lyudsʹki; vin ye tak unappreciative
Z tiny krapli, Vin utvoryuye yoho ta zamyslyuye yoho
Todi Vin pokazuye shlyakh dlya nʹoho
Todi Vin stavytʹ yoho do smerti, ta u seryoznoyi
Koly Vin wills, Vin resurrects yo
Shchob zabezpechyty pidtrymku zhyttya dlya vas ta vashykh tvaryn
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ koly kozhnyy tikaye z yoho brata
Kozhnyy odyn z nykh, na shcho denʹ, turboty pro yoho vlasnu dolyu
Deyaki oblychchya na shcho denʹ bude shchaslyvyy
Inshi oblychchya, na shcho denʹ, bude nakryvatysya z neshchastyam
divchyna shcho bula pokhovana zhyvyy prosytʹsya
Kozhna dusha bude znaty vse tse prynesene
Tse yavlyaye soboyu vysliv pochesnoho kur'yera
Vin povynen buty korytysya ta povynen buty doviryatysya
Vin pobachyv yoho u vysokomu obriyu
Vin ne trymaye nazad budʹ-yaku novynu
Zaraz todi, de vy budete ity
Tse ye povidomlennya dlya vsikh lyudey
Dlya tsykh khto bazhayutʹ poyikhaty pryamo
Shchob ni vy budete ye z·hidno z budete BOHA, Lorda vsesvitu
Kozhna dusha znayde shcho vyklykane tse prosunutysya, ta shcho vyklykala tse do rehresu
O vy lyudsʹki buduchy, shcho vidvely vas z vashoho Lorda Naybilʹsh Pochesnoho
khto utvoryv vas, zamysleni vy, ta perfected vy
U shchob ni proekt Vin vybrav, Vin skonstruyuvav tse
Oblivious do toho faktu, shcho ye (nevydymyy) keepers navkolo vas
V toy chas, yak bezputnyy zasluzhyly Peklo
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ koly niyaka dusha ne mozhe dopomohty inshiy dushi, ta vsi rishennya, na shcho denʹ, bude nalezhaty BOHU
Khto vymahayutʹ povnoyi miry otrymuyuchy z lyudey
Ale dayuchy yim zakhody abo tyahari, vony obduryuyutʹ
vony ne znayutʹ shcho vony budutʹ resurrected
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ koly vsi lyudy lyshatʹsya v syli pered tym, yak Lord vsesvitu
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
Vony ne viryatʹ v Dnyu Vyroku
Nikhto disbelieves tam krim porushnyka, sinful
Koly nashi vidkryttya deklamuyutʹsya yomu, vin kazhe, "Povisti z mynuli
Diysno, yikhni serdenʹka stavaly shielded yikhnimy hrikhamy
Diysno, vony budutʹ izolyuvatysya, na shcho denʹ, z yikhnʹoho Lorda
Todi vony budutʹ kydatysya u Peklo
Vony budutʹ rozpovidatysya, "Tse ye yaki vy zvychayno zaperechuvaly
Shchob buty zasvidchenyy tsym zakryttyam do Meni
Vy vyznayete u yikhnikh oblychchi radistʹ blazhenstva
Yikhni napiy budutʹ spiced z nektarom
Yoho spice vyhlyadaye yak musk. Tse ye shcho konkurenty musyatʹ konkuruvaty
Zmishuyutʹsya u tse budutʹ spetsialʹni smak
Z vesny shcho rezervuyetʹsya dlya tsʹoho zakryttya do Meni
bezputnyy zvychayno smiyavsya z tsykh khto vvazhaly
Koly vony proyshly povz nykh, vony zvychayno shtovkhaly utikhu
Koly vony pryyikhaly razom z yikhnimy lyudʹmy, vony zvychayno zhartuvaly
Koly zavhodno vony pobachyly yikh, vony skazaly, "Tsi lyudy daleko astray
Vony ne mayutʹ takoyi rechi yak (nevydymoyi) varty
Sʹohodni, tsey khto povirenyy smiyutʹsya z disbelievers
Naybilʹsh bezperechno, disbelievers requited za shcho vony
Tse pidkorytʹsya do yoho Lorda ta zakinchuyutʹsya
Tse bude eject yoho zmist, yak tse erupts
Tse pidkorytʹsya do yoho Lorda ta zakinchuyutʹsya
O humans, vy irreversibly holovuyete dlya zboriv z vashym Lordom
Yak dlya khto otrymuye yoho zapys u yoho pravi ruka
Vin povernetʹsya do yoho lyudey joyfully
Yak dlya khto otrymuye yoho zapys pozadu yoho spyny
Vin zvychayno diyav zukhvalo sered yoho lyudey
Vin podumav shcho vin bude nikoly ne poklykanyy do vidpovidi
Tak diysno, yoho Lord Seer yoho
Vy posunete z stadiyi do stadiyi
Ta koly Quran deklamuyetʹsya yim, vony ne upadutʹ prostrate
Tse tomu, shcho tsey khto disbelieved vidkhylyayutʹ (Quran)
BOH znaye tsilkom yikhni nayhlybshi dumky
Yak dlya tsykh khto vvazhaly ta pryviv spravedlyve zhyttya, vony otrymuyutʹ vynahorodu shcho dobre-zasluhovuyetʹsya
Vony nenavydily yikh z niyakoyi inshoyi prychyny nizh viryachoyi v BOHU, Mohutnʹomu, Praiseworthy
Yomu nalezhytʹ tsaryuvannyu neba ta zemli. Ta BOH zasvidchuye vsi rechi
Bezsumnivno, tsey khto peresliduyutʹ viryachyy lyudyam ta zhinkam, todi ne spromozhutʹsya shchob kayatysya, zaznaly retribution Gehenna; vony zaznaly retribution horyachoho
Bezsumnivno, tsey khto vvazhaly ta pryviv spravedlyve zhyttya, zasluzhyly park z techuchymy potokamy. Tse yavlyaye soboyu naybilʹsh velykyy triumf
Diysno, vash udar Lorda ye suvoryy
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto vystupaye z initsiatyvoyu ta povtoryuyetʹsya
Ta Vin yavlyaye soboyu Probachayutʹ, Naybilʹsh Lyub'yaznyy
Tsey khto disbelieve muchatʹsya z sprostuvannyam
Dozvolyayutʹ lyudsʹkyy viddzerkalyuyutʹ na yoho stvorenni
Vin buv utvorenyy z ejected ridkyy
Z mizh spynnym khrebtom ta viscera
Vin bude ne maty potuzhnosti, ne helper
Glorify nazva vashoho Lorda, naybilʹsh Vysokoho
Todi povertaye tse u svitle sino
My budemo deklamuvaty do vas; ne zabudʹte
Vse ye z·hidno z BOZHYM bude; Vin znaye shcho zayavlyayetʹsya, ta shcho ye prykhovanyy
My napravymo vas do naybilʹsh lehkoho shlyakhu
Tomu, vy budete nahadaty; mozhlyvo reminder bude vyhoda
Prychomu vin nikoly ne vmyraye, ne perebuvannya zhyvi
Uspishnyy diysno yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto vykupovuye yoho dushu
pam'yatayuchy nazvu yoho Lorda ta zauvazhuyuchykh kontaktnykh molytv (Salat)
Diysno, vy preoccupied z tse pershe zhyttya
Nezvazhayuchy na te, shcho U maybutnʹomu daleko krashche ta everlasting
Tse zapysuyetʹsya u bilʹsh rannikh vykladanni
Oblychchya na shcho denʹ bude shamed
Vony budutʹ ne maty prodovolʹstva krim daremnoho riznovydu
Tse nikoly nourishes, ne ne zadovolʹnyaye holod
Inshi oblychchya na shcho denʹ bude povnyy radosti
Chomu vony ne viddzerkalyuyutʹ na verblyudakh ta yak vony utvoryuyutʹsya
Ta nebo ta yak yomu pidnimayetʹsya
Ta hory ta yak vony konstruyuyutʹsya
Ta zemlya ta yak yomu buduyetʹsya
Vy budete nahadaty, dlya vashoyi misiyi musyte dostavyty tse reminder
Vy ne mayete enerhetychnoho nad nymy
Yak dlya tsykh khto prohanyayutʹ ta disbelieve
BOH zdiysnytʹ yikh do velykoho retribution
Do nas ye yikhnya ostatochna dolya
hlyboka klyatva, dlya odnoho khto volodiye rozvidkoyu
Tam vyhlyadalo nichoho yak tse anywhere
Takozh Thamoud, khto vyrizav skeli u yikhnʹomu valley
Otzhe, vash Lord lyvsya na nykh whipping retribution
Koly lyudsʹke isnuvannya vyprobovuyetʹsya yoho Lordom, cherez blahoslovennya ta radistʹ, vin kazhe, "Miy Lord ye velykodushnyy do meni
Ale yakshcho Vin vyprobovuye yoho cherez zmenshennya u umovakh, vin kazhe, "Miy Lord prynyzhuye meni
Nepravylʹnyy! Tse - vy kotri prynesly tse na sebe ne roz·hlyadayuchy syrotu
Ta ne zakhyshchayucha dobrodiynistʹ do bidna
Diysno, koly zemlya davytʹsya, nadzvychayno davytʹsya
Ta vash Lord prybuvaye, razom z anhelamy u ryadi pislya ryadu
Na shcho denʹ, Gehenna bude porodzhuvatysya. Na shcho denʹ, lyudsʹke isnuvannya zapam'yataye - ale shcho spohad - tse bude nadto pizno
Vin skazhe, "O, ya bazhayu I hotovoho do moho (vichnyy) zhyttya
Na shcho denʹ, niyakyy retribution ne mih buty hirshyy nizh Yoho retribution
Ta niyake obmezhennya ne ye take efektyvne yak Yoho obmezhennya
Yak dlya vas, O vmistu dusha
Vertayutʹ do vashoho Lorda, zadovolenoho ta harnoho
My utvoryly lyudsʹke isnuvannya popratsyuvaty tyazhki (shchob vykupyty sebe)
vin dumaye shcho niyakyy kozhnyy kolysʹ ne zaklykaye yoho vvazhaty
Vin khvalytʹsya, "ya vytratyv tak sylʹno hroshovyy
vin dumaye shcho niyakyy kozhnyy ne bachytʹ yoho
my ne daly yomu dva ochi
my ne pokazaly yomu dva shlyakhy
Kotryy kozhnyy yavlyaye soboyu tyazhkyy shlyakh
Abo bidnyy khto ye u potrebi
Ta buty odnym z tsykh khto vvazhayutʹ, ta exhorting odyn odnym shchob buty steadfast, ta exhorting odyn odnym shchob buty riznovyd
Yak dlya tsykh khto disbelieved u nashykh vidkryttyakh, vony zaznaly neshchastya
nebo ta Yo kotryy pobuduvav tse
zemlya ta Yo shcho pidtrymuye tse
dusha ta Yo kotryy utvoryv tse
Todi pokazalo tse shcho zlo ta shcho ye harne
Budutʹ nespromozhnyy odyn khto nekhtuye tse
BOZHYY kur'yer skazav yim, "Tse ye BOZHYY verblyud; dozvolʹte yiy p'yutʹ
Vony disbelieved yo ta ubyta yi. Yikhniy Lord todi requited yim dlya yikhnʹoho hrikha ta vynyshchyly yikh
Dosi, tsey khto prybuly pislya nykh zalyshayutʹsya neuvazhni
Ta Yo kotryy stvoryuvav muzhchyna ta zhinka
Tomu shcho dlya nʹoho khto daye dobrodiynistʹ ta pidtrymuye righteousness
Ale vin shcho stingy, khoch vin ye bahatyy
Yoho hroshi ne mozhutʹ dopomohty yomu koly vin padaye
My kontrolyuyemo U maybutnʹomu, tak zhe, yak i tse zhyttya
ya poperedyv vas pro palayuchi Hellfire
Khto daye z yoho hroshey dobrodiynosti
Shukayutʹ tilʹky yoho Lorda, naybilʹsh Vysokoho
Vash Lord nikoly ne pokynuv vas, ne zrobyly Vin zabuvayete
U maybutnʹomu daleko krashche dlya vas nizh tse pershe (zhyttya)
Ta vash Lord dastʹ vam dosytʹ; vy budete zadovolʹnyatysya
Vin ne znayshov vy pozbavyly batʹkiv ta Vin dav vam dim
Vin znayshov vas astray, ta kerovani vy
Vin znayshov vas bidni, ta zrobleni vam bahatym
Tomu, vy ne budete forsake syrota
Vy budete proholosyty blahoslovlyayuchoho vashoho Lorda podaruvaly vas
My exalted vy do pochesnoyi pozytsiyi
Koly zavhodno mozhlyvi vy budete doklasty zusylʹ
My utvoryly lyudynu u krashchomu proekti
Todi povernuv yoho u lowliest nyzʹko
Krim tsykh khto vvazhayutʹ ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya; vony otrymuyutʹ vynahorodu shcho dobre zasluhovuyetʹsya
BOH ne naybilʹsh Mudryy, vsikh mudrykh
Chytayutʹ, v im'ya vashoho Lorda, khto stvoryuvav
Chytayutʹ, ta vash Lord, Naybilʹsh Exalted
Vin navchaye lyudynu yakyy vin nikoly ne znav
Do vashoho Lorda yavlyaye soboyu ostatochnu dolyu
tse ne krashche dlya nʹoho shchob sliduyutʹ za kerivnytstvom
vin ne zdiysnyuye shcho BOH dyvytʹsya
Diysno, yakshcho ne vin utrymuyetʹsya, my vizʹmemo yoho forelock
Dozvolyayutʹ yomu todi zaklykayutʹ yoho helpers
Vy ne budete pidkorytysya yomu; vy budete upasty prostrate ta budete prytyahnuty blyzhche
My vidkryly tse u Nochi Doli
Yak awesome yavlyaye soboyu Nich Doli
Nich Doli krashche nizh misyatsi tysyachi
anhely ta Dukh spuskayutʹsya tam, yikhnim vid'yizdom Lorda, shchob vykonaty kozhnu komandu
Myrolyubne tse ye do advent svitanku
Tsey khto disbelieved sered lyudey svyatoho pysannya, tak zhe, yak i idol worshipers, napolyahayutʹ na yikhnikh shlyakhakh, nezvazhayuchy na dokaz danyy yim
kur'yer z BOHA deklamuye yim svyashchenni instruktsiyi
Faktychno, tsey khto otrymaly svyate pysannya ne posperechavsya do dokazu davavsya yim

Vesʹ shcho buv poproshenyy z nykh musytʹ obozhnyuvaty BOHA, prysvyachuyuchy relihiyu absolyutno yomu vyklyuchno, zauvazhuyutʹ kontaktni molytvy (Salat), ta dayutʹ obov'yazkovu dobrodiynistʹ (Zakat). Takyy yavlyaye soboyu doskonalu relihiyu
Tsey khto disbelieved sered lyudey svyatoho pysannya, ta idol worshipers, zaznaly vohnyu Gehenna zavzhdy. Vony yavlyayutʹ soboyu nayhirshykh stvorinnya
Tsey khto vvazhaly ta pryviv spravedlyve zhyttya yavlyayutʹ soboyu krashchykh stvorinnya

Yikhnya vynahoroda u yikhnʹomu Lordi yavlyaye soboyu park Eden z techuchymy potokamy, prychomu vony perebuyutʹ zavzhdy. BOH zadovolʹnyayetʹsya z nymy, ta vony zadovolʹnyayutʹsya z Nym. Takyy yavlyaye soboyu vynahorodu dlya tsiyeyi kotroyi povahy yikhniy Lord
Na shcho denʹ, tse kazhe yoho novynu
Na shcho denʹ, lyudy vydadutʹ z kozhnoho napryamu, shchob buty pokazani yikhni pratsi
Whoever vaha atomu harnoho pobachytʹ tse
Ta whoever vaha atomu zla pobachytʹ tse
Vin daye svidchennya do tsʹoho faktu
vin ne zdiysnyuye shcho denʹ prybude koly graves vidkryvayutʹsya
Vony znaydutʹ, na shcho denʹ, shcho yikhniy Lord ye tsilkom Cognizant z nykh
vy mayete budʹ-yaku ideyu shcho Shocker
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ koly vyydeni lyudy lyublyatʹ swarms metelykiv
Yak dlya nʹoho chyyi tyahari ye vazhki
Yak dlya nʹoho chyyi tyahari svitlo
Yakby tilʹky vy mohly znayty dlya pevnoho
Todi vy by pobachyly tse z okom certainty
Todi vy budete dopytuvatysya, na shcho denʹ, pro blahoslovennya vy otrymaly nasolodu

Krim tsykh khto vvazhayutʹ ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya, ta exhort odyn odnym uphold pravda, ta exhort odyn odnym shchob buty steadfast. . . V im'ya Boha, Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvoho, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnoho
Vin zapasaye hroshi ta rakhuye tse
Tak, yakby yoho hroshi zroblyatʹ yomu nevmyrushchomu
Nikoly ne; vin bude kydatysya u Devastator
vy vidznachyly yakoho vashoho Lorda do lyudey slona
Vin ne vyklykav yikhni skhemy backfire
Vin poslav na nykh swarms ptakhiv
Shcho showered yim z tyazhkymy kamenem
Vin zrobyv yim vidchuvayutʹ upodobannya do zhuvav sino
shlyakh vony plekayutʹ karavany zymy ta lita
Vony budutʹ obozhnyuvaty Lorda tse shrine
Dlya Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto fed yim pislya holodu, ta yakshcho yim z bezpekoyu pislya strakha
vy znayete kotri diysno vidmovu vira
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto mistreats syroty
Ta prykroshchi do tsykh khto zauvazhuyutʹ kontaktni molytvy (Salat)
khto ye povnistyu neuvazhnyy yikhnikh molytv
My blahoslovyly vas z bahato shchedrosti
Tomu, vy budete molytysya do vashoho Lorda (Salat), ta dayete dobrodiynistʹ
ya ne obozhnyuyu shcho vy obozhnyuyete
Ne robyte vy obozhnyuyete shcho ya obozhnyuyu
Ne budu ya kolysʹ obozhnyuyu shcho vy obozhnyuyete
Ne budete vy kolysʹ obozhnyuyete shcho ya obozhnyuyu
Do vy ye vasha relihiya, ta meni ye moya relihiya
Koly triumf prybuvaye z BOHA, ta peremohy
Vy pobachyte , shcho lyudy okhoplyuye BOZHA relihiya u natovpi
Vy budete glorify ta khvalyte vashoho Lorda, ta blahayete Yoho dlya forgiveness. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Redeemer
Zasudzhenyy yavlyayutʹ soboyu pratsi Abee Lahab, ta vin zasudzhuyetʹsya
Yoho hroshi ta shchob ni vin vykonanyy nikoly ne dopomozhe yomu
Takozh yoho druzhyna, khto pryviv persecution
Vona bude (resurrected) z kanatom shypiv navkolo yiyi shyyi
Proholoshuyutʹ, "Vin yavlyaye soboyu ta tilʹky BOHA
Nikoly ne zrobyv Vin beget. Ne Vin begotten
Kazhu, "ya shukayu prytulku u Lordi daybreak
Z zla temryavy yak tse padaye
Z zla envious koly vony zazdryatʹ
Kazhu, "ya shukayu prytulku u Lordi lyudey
